targets.query: select uptime_format from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_users") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(available_percent) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT available,available_percent FROM "mem" where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
select usage_idle,usage_iowait from cpu where cpu='cpu-total' and  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
select blocked,running,sleeping,total,total_threads,zombies from processes where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter

model.query: select load1 from system where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter

targets.query: select load1 from system where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
select free,used,total,used_percent from disk where "host" =~ /^$host$/  and path =  '$path' and $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT tcp_established,tcp_listen,tcp_syn_recv,tcp_syn_sent,tcp_time_wait,udp_socket FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: path
list.name: path
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path"

list.label: int
list.name: int
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface"
